actions.name: Innards Out

cost.trigger: The user would be @Affliction[fainted] by an attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user would be @Affliction[fainted] by an attack.

Effect: The user deals damage to the source of the triggering attack equal to the amount of HP the user lost from the triggering attack.

system.description:
